1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-colophon
1.0.0.description:
Stop using an SEO Tramp Stamp on your client's website in order to get a back-link to your own website. Instead, use the Colophon plugin to leave an unobtrusive mark in the form of the WEB_AUTHOR meta tag. This tag has zero impact on search rankings since it's ignored by the Search Engines. Footer spam needs to stop and this little plugin is my attempt at getting everyone to think of a better way to leave your mark.

What is a Colophon? http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colophon_%28publishing%29
